info.title: PDF Generation API
info.description: A FastAPI application that generates PDFs from HTML and CSS content

post.description: Generate a PDF file from HTML and CSS content.

pdf_title.title: Pdf Title
pdf_title.description:
Title of the PDF document; will be used as both the

$title

in the body and the $title.

contains_code.title: Contains Code
contains_code.description:
Indicates whether the 'body_content' includes code blocks. If set to true, the content may contain pre-formatted code blocks using 
 tags. To include code blocks, wrap snippets in 
...
 tags and specify the language using a class attribute, e.g., .

css_content.title: Css Content
css_content.description: Optional CSS styles to format the 'body_content' using selectors like tags, classes, and IDs. Provide custom styles or override default styles to achieve the desired layout and design.

output_filename.title: Output Filename
output_filename.description: Optional filename for the generated PDF. Use hyphens for spaces and do not include the file extension.
